name: Doosan Babcock
goal: Doosan Babcock is part of a powerful combination of companies united under the Doosan Group to deliver best-in-class technologies, skills and value to customers the world over.  We are a specialist in the delivery of engineering, aftermarket and upgrade services to the thermal power, nuclear, oil and gas, petrochemical and process industries.  Using best-in-class technical expertise and an industry-leading project management capability, the company builds, maintains and extends the life of customer assets worldwide.  From our base in Renfrew, established in 1891, we have grown to become a trusted partner in the global power industry, delivering smart energy products and solutions to help provide a sustainable future for generations to come. For more information on Doosan Babcock see www.doosanbabcock.com
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives:
MCPD

Heating and Cooling Strategy
Biomass and Bio energy
